description: Provides more detail about the cluster step.

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The identifier of the cluster with steps to describe.

parameters.name: StepId
parameters.description: The identifier of the step to describe.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the cluster step.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the cluster step.

nested_items.name: Jar
nested_items.description: The path to the JAR file that runs during the step.

nested_items.name: Properties
nested_items.description: The list of Java properties that are set when the step runs. You can use these properties to pass key-value pairs to your main function.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: MainClass
nested_items.description: The name of the main class in the specified Java file. If not specified, the JAR file should specify a main class in its manifest file.

nested_items.name: Args
nested_items.description: The list of command line arguments to pass to the JAR file's main function for execution.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ActionOnFailure
nested_items.description: The action to take when the cluster step fails. Possible values are TERMINATE_CLUSTER, CANCEL_AND_WAIT, and CONTINUE. TERMINATE_JOB_FLOW is provided for backward compatibility. We recommend using TERMINATE_CLUSTER instead.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The execution state of the cluster step.

nested_items.name: StateChangeReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the step execution status change.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The programmable code for the state change reason. Note: Currently, the service provides no code for the state change.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The descriptive message for the state change reason.

nested_items.name: FailureDetails
nested_items.description: The details for the step failure including reason, message, and log file path where the root cause was identified.

nested_items.name: Reason
nested_items.description: The reason for the step failure. In the case where the service cannot successfully determine the root cause of the failure, it returns 'Unknown Error' as a reason.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The descriptive message including the error the Amazon EMR service has identified as the cause of step failure. This is text from an error log that describes the root cause of the failure.

nested_items.name: LogFile
nested_items.description: The path to the log file where the step failure root cause was originally recorded.

nested_items.name: CreationDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the cluster step was created.

nested_items.name: StartDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the cluster step execution started.

nested_items.name: EndDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the cluster step execution completed or failed.

nested_items.name: ExecutionRoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the runtime role for a step on the cluster. The runtime role can be a cross-account IAM role. The runtime role ARN is a combination of account ID, role name, and role type using the following format: arn:partition:service:region:account:resource.
